component.name: Proxy Generator
component.summary: Video proxy and re-wrapper for DaVinci Resolve

description.p: Proxy Generator creates optimized proxy media for DaVinci Resolve workflows on Linux. Supports standard video formats as well as Blackmagic RAW (BRAW) and RED RAW (R3D).

ul.li: Proxy generation with configurable resolution and codec
Audio re-wrapping (AAC to PCM) with 1:1 channel preservation
Blackmagic RAW (BRAW) support via BRAW SDK
RED RAW (R3D) support via R3D SDK v9.1.2

description.p: Erste Version mit BRAW- und R3D-Support.
